officialTitle: A Randomized Clincial Trial to Evaluate the Effects of an Internett-based Support System for Cancer Patients on Symptom Distress, Depression, and Quality of Life.
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Above 18 years
* Starting or currently undergoing treatment for breast or prostate cancer
* Internet access at home

Exclusion Criteria:

* Patients who had received radiation on the brain as this may have affected their abilities to reliably report their symptoms.
